mapper.select: select s.sell_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, s.sell_date, w.warehouse_name, s.pay_type, s.sell_price, s.sell_amount from sell s, customer c, product p, warehouse w where s.customer_id = c.customer_id and s.product_id = p.product_id and s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id order by s.sell_id
mapper.update: update sell set pay_type = #{pay_type}, sell_price = #{sell_price}, sell_amount = #{sell_amount} where sell_id = #{sell_id}
mapper.select: select s.cbuy_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, s.cbuy_date, w.warehouse_name, s.pay_type, s.cbuy_priceout, s.cbuy_amount from company_buy s, customer c, product p, warehouse w where s.customer_id = c.customer_id and s.product_id = p.product_id and s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
mapper.update: update company_buy set pay_type = #{pay_type}, cbuy_priceout = #{cbuy_priceout}, cbuy_amount = #{cbuy_amount} where cbuy_id = #{cbuy_id}
mapper.select: select sell_id, customer_id, product_id, sell_date, warehouse_id, pay_type,sell_price, sell_amount from sell order by sell_id desc
